data.actual_result: Notice that the URL provided is filled with flags meant for other widgets, and that the chat widget preview nor the actual URL provided actually work
data.expected_result: The widget should work correctly and the URL should only contain fields meant for the widget selected
data.short_description: StreamKit Overlay configuration generator stacks up options in the URL that are meant for other widgets, sometimes breaking due to invalid syntax
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the StreamKit Overlay config page ( https://streamkit.discordapp.com/overlay ) - Ensure your downloaded Discord Client is running - Hit either of the install buttons (you won't actually be installing anything, just connecting to the client) - Configure the server and channel fields in all 3 widget configuration menus - Return to the chat widget screen
